description:
v2.1 list host support 'services' as filter but v2 does not. This makes difference between v2 and v2.1.

We need to make v2.1 same as v2 by removing that filter from v2.1. This can be added as microversion if required. 

Ref- Change-Id: I42163707049300b0dee677558ed49280bcc7369d
title: v2.1 list-host support 'service' filter but v2 does not

comments.content:
v2.1 list host support 'services' as filter but v2 does not. This makes difference between v2 and v2.1.

We need to make v2.1 same as v2 by removing that filter from v2.1. This can be added as microversion if required. 

Ref- Change-Id: I42163707049300b0dee677558ed49280bcc7369d
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/168264
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/168264
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=e8006761d7c1f0392c2675e3eb6e8d1c49c3ecb9
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit e8006761d7c1f0392c2675e3eb6e8d1c49c3ecb9
Author: ghanshyam <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Mar 27 17:20:58 2015 +0900

    Fix v2.1 list-host to remove 'services' filter
    
    In v2.1, list-host supports 'services' filter also
    But this is not case with v2 API. v2 list-host does not support
    'services' filter.
    v2.1 APIs should be same as v2 in all cases/scenarios.
    
    This is bug fix so not putting as microversions, its just a change to
    the v2.1 code so it is equivalent to v2. If later needed then, this can
    be reverted back as current ways via microversion.
    
    This was no best test coverage to catch this kind of issue.
    This was caught while merging the v2 and v2.1 tests
    - Ibd53a7ddd4792942fe2dc45121dcc25fc9864903
    
    Change-Id: I11210babde0c5a668c794cd6aae7eb8c5093a99c
    Closes-Bug: #1437184
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
